contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=December 2007}} '''Irene Wells Pennington''' (December 1898 – July 17, 2003) was the widow of Claude B. "Doc" Pennington, a wealthy [[petroleum industry|oilman]] from [[Louisiana]]. When he was well into his 90s and losing his touch mentally, she had him declared mentally incompetent and took charge of his fortune, estimated by [[Forbes]] at $600 million. She straightened out financial irregularities and replaced managers then and shortly after his death, before largely retiring herself. This drew considerable attention not only because of the substantial value of the fortune but because of the remarkable fact of a senile nonagenarian's affairs being taken over by someone actually slightly older than he. The Pennington family still owns substantial land in southern Louisiana. The [[Pennington Biomedical Research Center]] was named for the family. ==External links== *[http://www.forbes.com/finance/lists/54/1996/LIR.jhtml?passListId=54&passYear=1996&passListType=Person&uniqueId=3938&datatype=Person Claude Pennington on 1996 Forbes 400 (oldest member of the list)] *[http://www.forbes.com/finance/lists/54/1997/LIR.jhtml?passListId=54&passYear=1997&passListType=Person&uniqueId=4094&datatype=Person Irene Pennington on 1997 Forbes 400 (oldest member of the list)] *[http://www.forbes.com/finance/lists/54/1998/LIR.jhtml?passListId=54&passYear=1998&passListType=Person&uniqueId=2646&datatype=Person Irene Pennington on 1998 Forbes 400 (oldest member of the list)] *[http://www.forbes.com/finance/lists/54/1999/LIR.jhtml?passListId=54&passYear=1999&passListType=Person&uniqueId=2646&datatype=Person Irene Pennington on 1999 Forbes 400 (oldest member of the list)] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Pennington, Irene Wells | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1898 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = July 17, 2003 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pennington, Irene Wells}} [[Category:1898 births]] [[Category:2003 deaths]] [[Category:American centenarians]]
